title: WTB: 1889 A35 Goodwin Album Page Cards
author: RFResnick

posts.post_title: WTB: 1889 A35 Goodwin Album Page Cards
posts.post_content:
I know these don't come around very often, but my buddy Dave and I are both trying to collect the 1889 A35 Goodwin Round Album. Do you -- or anyone you know -- have some pages to sell??? Thanks for any help. -- Rick

[Links show examples of A35s]
[url]https://photos.app.goo.gl/No6VQGHkZNqa6PDd6[/url]

[url]https://photos.app.goo.gl/eGMtpbv78x8DqNyM7[/url]

and what condition are you looking for?
friendly,
henry

Thanks, Henry. 
Condition (almost) doesn’t matter. I tend to prefer bruised items because that makes them more affordable. I’m looking to buy and keep. I’m not looking to flip. 
Please let me know if you have any leads. 
Many thanks,
Rick

Album secured ... and it's a beauty!!!

Thank you so much, Henry. Thrilled to be a full member of the A35 Goodwin Round Album club!

(It wouldn't have happened without Net54 ... Thanks!)
